instruction: Imagine a new app that allows people to get the best deals on groceries. What is the elevator pitch for this app?
output: Introducing the Grocery Deals App - the ultimate tool to save you time and money when shopping for groceries. Quickly compare prices from all your local stores, find the best deals on the items you need, and save big without having to visit different stores. With Grocery Deals App, you can get the most for your money and shop smarter.
